DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine long term safety Enbrel adult active rheumatoid arthritis Luxemburg . This post-marketing surveillance study rheumatology practice patient . All patient initiate Enbrel observe start study Feb 2003 period least 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Enbrel In Adults With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis In Luxemburg
DOC.criteria: Have moderate severe active rheumatoid arthritis Be age 17 year Have inadequate response DMards Give write informed consent Physician decide prescribe Enbrel
